alert.note: Alert for Eddy County Plains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 10 at 3:03PM MDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Eddy County through 345 PM MDT... At 303 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles northwest of Hope, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hope and Artesia Municipal Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
